title: My Top Solo Ranking of Board Games
description: My solo ranking of all games I've played as of May 27th 2023
html:
This is my top solo ranking of all board games I have played as of May 27th 2023

This list includes any expansions for the game where solo only or not as listing expansions would be too confusing. This includes solo only and solo mode games but does not consider the multiplayer modes in any way. This list also mixes games regardless of size and complexity.

Top 10 Solo Games

  1. One Deck Dungeon
  2. Death Valley
  3. ROVE: Results-Oriented Versatile Explorer
  4. Under Falling Skies
  5. Galdor's Grip
  6. Agropolis
  7. Sprawlopolis
  8. Iron Helm
  9. Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion
  10. Imperium: Legends (Legends > Classics)

Top 10 Print and Play SoloGames

  1. Adamastor
  2. Palm Island
  3. Death Valley
  4. ROVE: Results-Oriented Versatile Explorer
  5. Under Falling Skies
  6. Maquis
  7. Galdor's Grip
  8. Agropolis
  9. Sprawlopolis
  10. Iron Helm
